message.content:
cs.CL, cs.SI, cs.IR, cs.LG, cs.CY 

This paper is about part-of-speech tagging for Italian Twitter data, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.CL (Computation and Language) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also discusses the use of silver-labelled data scraped from Facebook, which involves web scraping and data mining, making cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) and cs.IR (Information Retrieval) likely sub-categories as well. The use of machine learning techniques for training the tagger suggests cs.LG (Machine Learning) as another possible sub-category. Finally, the paper also touches upon the challenges of processing noisy and informal language, which could fall under cs.CY (Computers and Society).
